about_the_game:
Tales of the Tavern is a top-down, fantasy ARPG that mixes intense combat with cozy life-sim elements like cooking, farming and Base-Building. Set in the vibrant 3D world of Neverue, filled with detailed 2D characters, the game offers a unique blend of combat, crafting, and exploring the world.

EXPLORE AND SAVE NEVERUE

Step into the shoes of Gwen, a chef-turned-heroine from the quaint town of Osul, as she navigates through enchanting realms, as well as mystical dungeons and magical caverns. Each realm offers unique environments to explore, resources to gather, and mysteries to solve.

DYNAMIC COMBAT AND CULINARY MAGIC

Engage in high-speed battles using a variety of weapons and spells. Between skirmishes, retreat to Tohm Kyatt's tavern to cook up power-boosting meals with ingredients collected on your adventures. Master the culinary arts with interactive cooking minigames that affect your combat abilities.

A RICH TAPESTRY OF ACTIVITIES

When not in combat, Gwen can farm, fish, trade, and gather resources to sustain her adventures and craft new gear. Each activity is designed to seamlessly integrate into the game’s storyline and progression, enhancing the immersive experience of living in Neverue.

QUESTS AND DUNGEONS

Embark on an array of quests that propel you through the game’s rich narrative. From clearing out infested dungeons to rescuing mythical creatures, each quest offers unique challenges and rewards. Discover and cook ancient recipes that unlock secrets to forgotten magic.

BUILT FOR REPLAYABILITY

"Tales of the Tavern" is designed with replayability in mind. The game's dynamic world evolves with each playthrough, offering new challenges and opportunities. Different realms offer distinct climates and ecosystems, demanding adaptive strategies and gameplay styles.

SEAMLESS INTEGRATION OF GAMEPLAY STYLES

The game harmoniously blends action-packed adventures with relaxing downtime activities. Whether you're in a heated battle or tending to your garden, the transition is fluid, keeping you engaged and invested in both the thrill of combat and the satisfaction of crafting and building.

SIGNATURE ARTISTIC FLAIR

Enjoy a visually captivating experience where animated 2D characters interact within a lush 3D world, enriched by hand-painted textures and a vibrant soundtrack. "Tales of the Tavern" offers a unique aesthetic that bridges the gap between action and tranquility, making every aspect of the game a joy to explore.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.13.6+
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 5000 (must support Metal API)
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.14+
  • Processor: Quad Core 3.0 GHz+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD 630+ (must support Metal API)
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

name: Tales of the Tavern

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 950, Radeon R7 360, or Intel HD Graphics 630
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad Core 2.4ghz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2060, Radeon RX 5600 XT, or Intel Arc A580
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
